com

Class SeatingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SeatingHandler

  • public class SeatingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for handling filling in any class and creating a seating chart.
    Author:
    Jagan Prem
    See Also:
    Room

      • fill

        public void fill(java.lang.String teacher,
                 int students)
        Fills subsequent rooms until there is no more left to fill or the auditorium becomes full.
        Parameters:
        teacher - The teacher whose class is filling in.
        students - The number of students to fill in.
        See Also:
        Room.fill(String, int)

      • fill

        public void fill(java.util.ArrayList<ClassPeriod> classes,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> grades,
                 boolean male,
                 boolean female)
        Fills the auditorium with the provided list of classes under the specified restrictions.
        Parameters:
        classes - The list of ClassPeriod objects to fill in.
        grades - The list of grades of students.
        male - Whether to include male students.
        female - Whether to include female students.
        See Also:
        ClassPeriod.getClassSize(int, boolean, boolean), fill(String, int)

      • fill

        public void fill(java.util.ArrayList<ClassPeriod> classes,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> grades,
                 boolean male,
                 boolean female,
                 ClassPeriodDistanceComparator comparator)
        Fills the auditorium with the provided list of classes under the specified restrictions, while sorting by distance
        Parameters:
        classes - The list of ClassPeriod objects to fill in.
        grades - The list of grades of students.
        male - Whether to include male students.
        female - Whether to include female students.
        comparator - The comparator to sort rooms by.
        See Also:
        ClassPeriodDistanceComparator, fill(ArrayList, ArrayList, boolean, boolean)
